description: The island's maximum speed limit will rise from 40mph to 60mph on 15 June, the chief minister says.
title: Coronavirus: Isle of Man temporary national speed limit to rise
title_page: Coronavirus: Isle of Man temporary national speed limit to rise - BBC News
maintext: In future those coming back to the island may be allowed to travel by air routes rather than ferry, and could be permitted to self-isolate with the rest of those in their household at home.
